description: A high-performance wireless gaming mouse with RGB lighting.
name: Logitech G502 Lightspeed
detail: Features HERO 25K sensor, 11 programmable buttons, and PowerPlay compatibility.

description: Ergonomic mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting.
name: Razer BlackWidow V3
detail: Equipped with Razer Green Switches for tactile feedback and durability.

description: A powerful gaming laptop with RTX 3060 GPU and 144Hz display.
name: Asus ROG Strix G15
detail: Comes with AMD Ryzen 7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and Windows 11.

description: High-fidelity over-ear headphones with noise cancellation.
name: Sony WH-1000XM4
detail: Industry-leading noise cancellation and up to 30 hours of battery life.

description: Smartwatch with heart rate monitoring and fitness tracking features.
name: Apple Watch Series 7
detail: Features Always-On Retina display, ECG app, and water resistance.

description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass and waterproof design.
name: JBL Flip 5
detail: 12 hours of playtime, rugged IPX7 waterproof design, and party boost feature.

description: Full HD IPS gaming monitor with 165Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time.
name: Acer Nitro VG240YS
detail: Supports AMD FreeSync, HDR, and ultra-thin bezels for immersive gaming.

description: Portable external SSD with ultra-fast transfer speeds.
name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD
detail: Up to 1050MB/s read speed, shock-resistant, and AES 256-bit encryption.

description: Feature-packed mirrorless camera with 4K video recording.
name: Canon EOS M50 Mark II
detail: Dual Pixel AF, vari-angle touchscreen, and live streaming capabilities.

description: Smart home assistant with voice recognition and IoT support.
name: Google Nest Hub
detail: 7-inch touchscreen display, Google Assistant built-in, and smart home controls.
